front.title: Use Cases for DDoS Open Threat Signaling (DOTS) Telemetry

abstract.t: DDoS Open Threat Signaling (DOTS) Telemetry enriches the base DOTS protocols to assist the mitigator in using efficient DDoS attack mitigation techniques in a network. This document presents sample use cases for DOTS Telemetry. It discusses in particular what components are deployed in the network, how they cooperate, and what information is exchanged to effectively use these techniques.
